newsitem.title: USA: Fidelity Emerging Asia bid oversubscribed.
newsitem.headline: Fidelity Emerging Asia bid oversubscribed.

text.p: Fidelity Advisor Emerging Asia Fund Inc said Tuesday that its offer to repurchase up to 10 percent of its shares of common stock expired and about 4.9 million shares were tendered.
Based on this preliminary information, the proration for each tendering shareholder is estimated to be 17.2 percent of the shares properly tendered, it said.
